archimate:TechnologyService.name: Visualisation platforms
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation: Tools or systems designed to create, manage, and interact with visual representations of data. These platforms facilitate the transformation of complex datasets into graphical or visual forms such as charts, graphs, maps, dashboards, and interactive visuals. The goal of these platforms is to make data more understandable, accessible, and actionable, allowing users to explore, analyze, and communicate insights effectively.
